1464350.name: Fear in The Modern House - CH2
1464350.description:
A psychological horror game developed by only one person, with what he had in hand, a not very good machine, but made with all the dedication.



After some time, after the accident that you caused, in which it cost the life of your wife and children, you live the life of Josh, a normal person, but after that, everything changed in his life, Josh blames himself for what he committed, and consequently, it affected in a way. You start to witness paranormal events at your residence, and your goal is to try to find out why these events are occurring.



  • A horror game where events take place chronologically, that is, they are always moving around the house.

  • A game that lasts an average of 25 minutes, however, each minute will be worth it.

  • Atmospheric Terror
1464350.supported_languages:
葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
